Landing.templateSubtitle: Turbo Nest Trpc Next - Boiler plate monorepo (Bun)

descriptions.fullstackTypeSafety: Create a NestJS endpoint and call it from the frontend with complete type safety.
descriptions.shareResources: Create a simple React component and share it between your apps.
descriptions.storybook: Create your stories and develop your components in isolation.
descriptions.typedEnv: Typed and validated environment variables at startup.
descriptions.internationalisation: Use next-intl to translate your application easily.
descriptions.apiProtection: AuthRouter + @Public for public routes, protected routes require a session. Try both fetches below.
descriptions.autoDoc: Auto-generated API documentation with trpc-ui: explore routers, run queries and mutations, and view responses.
descriptions.authentication: Sign in, sign up and session management on the front-end with Better Auth.
descriptions.logging: Use LoggedAuthRouter to get formatted request logs (URL, meta, response) in the terminal.

step7.title: Auto documentation
step7.description: The API documentation is auto-generated with trpc-ui. You get an interactive UI to browse all routers, run queries and mutations, and see responses.

I18nExample.title: Hello world!
I18nExample.description: This text is translated using next-intl.
